zh-CN.Libel1: Visual Studio 离线安装包文件夹
zh-CN.Libel2: Visual Studio 安装包目录文件名 [ 默认为：Catalog.json ]
zh-CN.Libel4: 需要清理的文件夹数量：
zh-CN.Libel5: 不需要的文件夹将被移动到：
zh-CN.FolderBrowserDialogDescription: 请选择 Visual Studio 离线安装包文件夹
zh-CN.MsgValidVsFolder: 你选择的文件夹不是有效的 Visual Studio 离线安装包文件夹，该文件夹下应包含：Catalog.json、vs_installer.opc、vs_setup.exe 等文件。
zh-CN.MsgCleanupDoneDiskSpace: 清理过程已完成，节省了大约 {0} 磁盘空间，请删除 "{1}" 文件夹以节省磁盘空间。
zh-CN.MsgCleanupDoneNoDiskSpace: 清理过程已完成，请删除 "{0}" 文件夹以节省磁盘空间。
zh-CN.MsgMoveToRecycle: 被删除的文件是否放到回收站?
zh-CN.MsgEmptyRecycleBin: 清理过程已完成，请清空回收站以节省磁盘空间。
zh-CN.MsgSelectCatalogFile: 请选择离线安装包目录文件，默认文件名为：Catalog.json
zh-CN.MsgCatalogFileNameError: 离线安装包目录文件错误，默认安装包目录文件名为：Catalog.json
zh-CN.MsgCatalogFolderError: 安装包目录文件所在的文件夹不是有效的 Visual Studio 离线安装包文件夹，该文件夹下应包含：Catalog.json、vs_installer.opc、vs_setup.exe 等文件。
zh-CN.MsgCatalogContentsError: 离线安装包目录文件没有包含有效的安装信息

en-US.Libel2: Visual Studio Offline Update Catalog FileName [ Default : Catalog.json ]
en-US.Libel4: Number of Folder Needs to be Cleaned :
en-US.Libel5: Unneeded Folder will be moved to :
en-US.FolderBrowserDialogDescription: Please Select Visual Studio Offline Directory.
en-US.MsgValidVsFolder: The folder you selected is not a valid Visual Studio offline installation package folder.The folder should contain files such as Catalog.json, vs_installer.opc, and vs_setup.exe.
en-US.MsgCleanupDoneDiskSpace: Cleanup process is done, Saved about {0} in disk Space, Please delete the "{1}" directory to save disk space.
en-US.MsgCleanupDoneNoDiskSpace: Cleanup process is done, Please delete the "{0}" directory to save disk space.
en-US.MsgMoveToRecycle: Should the deleted files be placed in the Recycle Bin?
en-US.MsgEmptyRecycleBin: Cleanup process is done, Please empty the Recycle Bin to save disk space.
en-US.MsgSelectCatalogFile: Please select the offline installation package catalog file. The default file name is: Catalog.json.
en-US.MsgCatalogFileNameError: The offline installation package catalog file error. The default installation package catalog file name is: Catalog.json.
en-US.MsgCatalogFolderError: The folder where the installation package catalog file is not the Visual Studio offline installation package folder. This folder should contain files such as Catalog.json, vs_installer.opc, and vs_setup.exe.
en-US.MsgCatalogContentsError: The offline installation package catalog file does not contain valid installation information.
